DOC.brief_summary: The purpose 3-month study evaluate subjective response upgrade contact lens .
DOC.criteria: Have normal ocular finding . Be able wear study lenses available power . Currently wear contact lens minimum 5 day week , least 8 hour day . Wear Night & Day contact lens . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Require concurrent ocular medication . Eye injury surgery within twelve week prior enrollment . Currently enrol ophthalmic clinical trial . Any active corneal infection . Corneal refractive surgery . Wear AIR OPTIX NIGHT & DAY AQUA lens . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
